question: Which of the following project is launched for Financial Inclusion of Rural Population recently?
explanation: Union Minister of Communications, Manoj Sinha launched DARPAN - "Digital Advancement of Rural Post Office for A New India". DARPAN project will be implemented with financial outlay of Rs. 1400 Crore. Under the project, each Branch Postmaster (BPM) will be provided a low power technology solution that will enable each of approximately 1.29 Lakhs Branch Post Offices (BOs) to enhance the quality of services being offered to rural customers across all the states of India.
